department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: High Pressure and Structural Welding services
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-05-18 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Work under this Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) includes the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and materials as requested by National Defence (DND) in the form of call-ups for High Pressure and Structural Welding services for Real Property Operations Group \\
